item.description:
Get ready for the last TechAviv meetup of 2010. We are ending the year with three amazing companies presenting at MIT right before the holiday break! Please help spread the word to israeli entrepreneurs and Investors in New England.

December Presenters:
1) Saveby - Yoav Perry - COO & Co-Founder (@saveby)
2) ActivePath - Renan Levy - CEO
3) FST21 - Avi Lupo - CEO & President FST21 Americas
(@fst21)

When & Where:
MIT
Building E51 - Room 315
70 Memorial Drive
Cambridge, MA

Agenda:
6:30pm-7:00pm Networking & Intros (Pizza)
7:00pm-8:00pm Product Demos, Group Q&A, Voting
8:00pm-8:30pm Member Announcements & Networking

Looking to hire top Israeli talent?
Post free on the TechAviv Job Board

Thanks to our Sponsors
The Boston TechAviv Founders Club is made possible because we have great sponsors. Special thanks to:
Nixon Peabody and are new sponsor ExchangeGuru!

Sponsorship Opportunities
Please email Gil or Yaron if you are interested or know somebody who is interested in sponsoring the Boston branch or global TechAviv Founders Club.

See you soon!

Gil & Yaron
@giljzim
@YaronSamid
@TechAviv
www.techaviv.com
item.name: TechAviv MA December 2010 Meetup
